languages.text: Ходили слухи, что на аренах Комморры появился новый устрашающий боец — изувеченная, обезумевшая развалина, рьяно кромсающая соперников на куски. Купаясь в реках крови, в экстазе ярости он вторил ревом восторженным зрителям, выкрикивающим имя: "А-ХЕ-ЛАС! А-ХЕ-ЛАС!"

There were rumours of a frightening new fighter in the arenas of Commorragh — a crippled, insane Wrack that fervently hacked his opponents to pieces. Bathing in rivers of blood, ecstatic with rage, he echoed the cries of the delighted spectators, shouting, "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"
languages.original_text: Ходили слухи, что на аренах Комморры появился новый устрашающий боец — изувеченная, обезумевшая развалина, рьяно кромсающая соперников на куски. Купаясь в реках крови, в экстазе ярости он вторил ревом восторженным зрителям, выкрикивающим имя: "А-ХЕ-ЛАС! А-ХЕ-ЛАС!"

traits.locale_text: People said that a new frightening fighter entered the arenas of Commorragh, a crippled, insane wrack of a being, fervently hacking his opponents apart. Bathing in rivers of blood, in the enthralment of his rage, he echoed the cries of the exalted spectators, shouting: "ACHILAS! ACHILAS!"

People said that a new frightening fighter entered the arenas of Commorragh, a crippled, insane wrack of a being, fervently hacking his opponents apart. Bathing in rivers of blood, in the enthralment of his rage, he echoed the cries of the exalted spectators, shouting: "ACHILAS! ACHILAS!"

There were rumours of a new frightening fighter in the arenas of Commorragh — a crippled, insane wrack that fervently hacked his opponents to pieces. Bathing in rivers of blood, ecstatic with rage, he echoed the cries of delighted spectators, shouting: "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"

There were rumours of a new frightening fighter in the arenas of Commorragh — a crippled, insane wrack that fervently hacked his opponents to pieces. Bathing in rivers of blood, ecstatic with rage, he echoed the cries of delighted spectators, shouting: "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"

There were rumours of a frightening new fighter in the arenas of Commorragh — a crippled, insane Wrack that fervently hacked his opponents to pieces. Bathing in rivers of blood, ecstatic with rage, he echoed the cries of the delighted spectators, shouting, "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"

There were rumours of a frightening new fighter in the arenas of Commorragh — a crippled, insane Wrack that fervently hacked his opponents to pieces. Bathing in rivers of blood, ecstatic with rage, he echoed the cries of the delighted spectators, shouting, "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"

languages.text: 有传言说，科摩罗的竞技场上出现了一位新的可怕战士。那是个残缺扭曲、精神错乱的凌虐者。他狂热地把对手撕成碎片，沐浴在血泊中，沉浸于狂怒之中，在观众的欢呼声中发出咆哮：“阿、吉、利、斯！阿、吉、利、斯！”
languages.original_text: There were rumours of a frightening new fighter in the arenas of Commorragh — a crippled, insane Wrack that fervently hacked his opponents to pieces. Bathing in rivers of blood, ecstatic with rage, he echoed the cries of the delighted spectators, shouting, "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"

traits.locale_text: 有传言说，科摩罗的竞技场上出现了一位新的可怕战士。那是个残缺扭曲、精神错乱的凌虐者。他狂热地把对手撕成碎片，沐浴在血泊中，沉浸于狂怒之中，在观众的欢呼声中发出咆哮：“阿、吉、利、斯！阿、吉、利、斯！”

languages.text: Es gab Gerüchte von einem neuen, furchterregenden Kämpfer in den Arenen von Commorragh — einem verkrüppelten, wahnsinnigen Wrack, der seine Gegner voller Eifer in Stücke hackte. Er badete in Flüssen aus Blut und nahm mit ekstatischem Zorn die Rufe der verzückten Zuschauer auf: "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"
languages.original_text: There were rumours of a frightening new fighter in the arenas of Commorragh — a crippled, insane Wrack that fervently hacked his opponents to pieces. Bathing in rivers of blood, ecstatic with rage, he echoed the cries of the delighted spectators, shouting, "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"

traits.locale_text: Es gab Gerüchte von einem neuen, furchterregenden Kämpfer in den Arenen von Commorragh — einem verkrüppelten, wahnsinnigen Wrack, der seine Gegner voller Eifer in Stücke hackte. Er badete in Flüssen aus Blut und nahm mit ekstatischem Zorn die Rufe der verzückten Zuschauer auf: "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"

languages.text: Des rumeurs commencèrent à circuler au sujet d'un nouveau combattant terrifiant dans les arènes de Commorragh : une gorgone démente et estropiée qui taillait ses adversaires en pièces. Dans l'extase de la rage, il se baignait dans des rivières de sang et répétait les cris des spectateurs ravis : « A-CHI-LAS ! » « A-CHI-LAS ! »
languages.original_text: There were rumours of a frightening new fighter in the arenas of Commorragh — a crippled, insane Wrack that fervently hacked his opponents to pieces. Bathing in rivers of blood, ecstatic with rage, he echoed the cries of the delighted spectators, shouting, "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"

traits.locale_text: Des rumeurs commencèrent à circuler au sujet d’un nouveau combattant terrifiant dans les arènes de Commorragh : une gorgone démente et estropiée qui taillait ses adversaires en pièces. Dans l’extase de la rage, il se baignait dans des rivières de sang et répétait les cris des spectateurs ravis : « A-CHI-LAS ! » « A-CHI-LAS ! »

languages.text: Había rumores de un guerrero aterrador en las arenas de Commorragh: un desdichado tullido y loco que despedazaba a sus adversarios sin piedad. Empapado en sangre y consumido por la ira, se hacía eco de los gritos de los espectadores fascinados: «¡A-CHI-LAS! ¡A-CHI-LAS!».
languages.original_text: There were rumours of a frightening new fighter in the arenas of Commorragh — a crippled, insane Wrack that fervently hacked his opponents to pieces. Bathing in rivers of blood, ecstatic with rage, he echoed the cries of the delighted spectators, shouting, "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"

traits.locale_text: Había rumores de un guerrero aterrador en las arenas de Commorragh: un desdichado tullido y loco que despedazaba a sus adversarios sin piedad. Empapado en sangre y consumido por la ira, se hacía eco de los gritos de los espectadores fascinados: «¡A-CHI-LAS! ¡A-CHI-LAS!».

languages.text: コモラフの闘技場に、新たな恐るべきファイターが現れたという噂が流れた。それは、手足が不自由で狂気に取りつかれたラックは、猛烈に相手を切り刻んでいたと言われている。血の海を浴び、怒りで恍惚し、歓喜に沸く観客の叫び声に応えて、「ア・キ・ラス！ア・キ・ラス！」と叫んでいたとも伝えられている。
languages.original_text: There were rumours of a frightening new fighter in the arenas of Commorragh — a crippled, insane Wrack that fervently hacked his opponents to pieces. Bathing in rivers of blood, ecstatic with rage, he echoed the cries of the delighted spectators, shouting, "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"

traits.locale_text: コモラフの闘技場に、新たな恐るべきファイターが現れたという噂が流れた。それは、手足が不自由で狂気に取りつかれたラックは、猛烈に相手を切り刻んでいたと言われている。血の海を浴び、怒りで恍惚し、歓喜に沸く観客の叫び声に応えて、「ア・キ・ラス！ア・キ・ラス！」と叫んでいたとも伝えられている。

languages.text: Commorragh arenalarında dehşet saçan yeni bir dövüşçü ortaya çıktığına dair söylentiler hızla yayıldı. Sakat ve delirmiş Harap, rakiplerini büyük bir hiddetle paramparça ediyordu. Cesetlerden akan kanları vücuduna döküyor, öfkeyle kendinden geçiyor, zevkten dört köşe olmuş seyircilerin "A-CHİ-LAS! A-CHİ-LAS!" tezahüratlarına karşılık veriyordu.
languages.original_text: There were rumours of a frightening new fighter in the arenas of Commorragh — a crippled, insane Wrack that fervently hacked his opponents to pieces. Bathing in rivers of blood, ecstatic with rage, he echoed the cries of the delighted spectators, shouting, "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"

traits.locale_text: Commorragh arenalarında dehşet saçan yeni bir savaşçı ortaya çıktığına dair söylentiler hızla yayıldı. Sakat ve delirmiş Harap, rakiplerini büyük bir hiddetle paramparça ediyordu. Cesetlerden akan kanları vücuduna döküyor, öfkeyle kendinden geçiyor, zevkten dört köşe olmuş seyircilerin tezahüratlarına karşılık veriyordu: "A-CHI-LAS! A-CHI-LAS!"
